title: Fedhas' Mad Dash
data:
**Fedhas' Mad Dash** is one of the original four [Dungeon Sprint](/Dungeon_Sprint "Dungeon Sprint") modules.

See the [Sprint guide](/Sprint_guide "Sprint guide") for further advice.

## Layout

```
NAME:   dungeon_sprint_fedhas
TAGS:   sprint no_item_gen no_trap_gen no_monster_gen no_pool_fixup no_rotate no_hmirror no_vmirror
DESC:   Sprint IV: "Fedhas' Mad Dash"
ORIENT: encompass
SUBVAULT: o : temple
KMONS:  A = fungus
KMONS:  B = spriggan hd:3
KMONS:  C = oklob sapling hp:7
KMONS:  D = oklob sapling hp:15 name:wizard n_suf spells:magic_dart;.;cantrip;magic_dart actual_spells
KMONS:  E = scorpion
KMONS:  F = wandering mushroom
KMONS:  G = burning bush
KMONS:  H = killer bee
KMONS:  I = queen bee
KMONS:  L = oklob plant
KMONS:  J = spriggan druid
KMONS:  M = oklob plant hp:30 name:conjurer n_suf spells:stone_arrow;.;.;.;iskenderun's_mystic_blast actual_spells
KMONS:  N = giant spore
KMONS:  O = oklob plant hp:30 name:summoner n_suf spells:call_imp;.;.;summon_swarm actual_spells
KMONS:  P = oklob plant hp:30 name:shifter n_suf spells:blink_other;blink_other actual_spells
KMONS:  Q = demonic crawler
KMONS:  R = spriggan rider
KMONS:  T = spriggan
KMONS:  U = spriggan berserker
KMONS:  V = Agnes
KMONS:  W = spriggan defender
KMONS:  X = spriggan rider ; bow unrand:storm_bow . arrow
KMONS:  Y = bush
KMONS:  a = yellow wasp
KMONS:  b = ghost moth
KMONS:  d = oklob plant name:meteorologist n_suf spells:sunray;.;.;airstrike actual_spells
KMONS:  e = oklob plant name:demonologist n_suf spells:summon_demon;.;.;summon_demon;.;malign_gateway actual_spells
KMONS:  f = oklob plant name:annihilator n_suf spells:poison_arrow;orb_of_destruction;.;.;bolt_of_cold actual_spells
KMONS:  g = the Enchantress
KMONS:  h = moth of wrath
KMONS:  m = green rat
KMONS:  n = worker ant
KMONS:  u = grey rat
KITEM:  j = piece of ambrosia q:3
KITEM:  k = honeycomb q:3
KITEM:  n = ring of invisibility ident:type
KITEM:  M = any book
KITEM:  # = Orb of Zot
KFEAT:  Z = any shop

MAP

xcccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccccx

NAME:   sprint_temple
TAGS:   temple no_rotate no_hmirror no_vmirror
KFEAT:  A = altar_cheibriados
KFEAT:  B = altar_zin
KFEAT:  C = altar_elyvilon
KFEAT:  D = altar_the_shining_one
KFEAT:  E = altar_okawaru
KFEAT:  F = altar_yredelemnul
KFEAT:  G = altar_kikubaaqudgha
KFEAT:  H = altar_trog
KFEAT:  I = altar_lugonu
KFEAT:  J = altar_nemelex_xobeh
KFEAT:  K = altar_xom
KFEAT:  L = altar_beogh
KFEAT:  M = altar_jiyva
KFEAT:  N = altar_vehumet
KFEAT:  O = altar_sif_muna
KFEAT:  P = altar_makhleb
KMONS:  X = oklob sapling name:priest n_suf spells:cantrip;.;cantrip;smiting priest_spells

.T.........T.
.A.B.C.D.E.F.
..M.NXO.P.T..
.G.H.I.J.K.L.
.T.........T.
ENDMAP
```

html:
Fedhas' Mad Dash

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search

Fedhas' Mad Dash is one of the original four Dungeon Sprint modules.

See the Sprint guide for further advice.

Layout

TAGS:   sprint no_item_gen no_trap_gen no_monster_gen no_pool_fixup no_rotate no_hmirror no_vmirror
